company's website. The primary focus was on implementing two major solutions to boost conversion rates.

59:
y, I endeavored to improve the structure of the product catalog by employing topic extraction techniques. The goal was to challenge existing categorizations and identify new categories that could enhance website navigation.

us, encoding the texts with TF-IDF transformation, and training a clustering model using DBSCAN on the TF-IDF matrix.

61:
